title: French Cotton Net Bag
description: The French Cotton Net Bag is styled after the fisherman net bags known as filet in France. Made from 100% cotton, the net bag is light and versatile for carrying everything from market groceries to beach essentials and can hold up to 40 lbs.

title: Cotton Mesh Produce Bags
description: These 100% cotton mesh produce bags are a sustainable and reusable alternative to plastic bags. Each bag comes with a handy drawstring to help you keep your food from falling out—no more tying plastic bags in a knot!

title: 9OZ SS TUMBLER
description: Cheers! This 9oz stainless steel tumbler is perfect for hosting parties, a zero waste lunch kit, or to stick in your bathroom as a toothbrush holder / water cup.

title: BABY BOTTLE
description:
5oz holds 5 fluid ounces and has a slow-flow nipple recommended for 0-6+ months

9oz holds 9 fluid ounces and has a medium flow nipple recommend for 6+ months

    Contoured tapered bottle designed for little hands
    Easy-to-read measurements on the inside and outside of the bottle
    Wide-mouth for easy filling, pouring and cleaning
    Wide base and nipple shape encourages proper latching
    Soft, medical grade silicone nipple promotes correct oral development and healthy teeth
    Double-venting reduces colic
    Nipple flow rates allow natural-paced relaxed feedings
    Portable, reusable, and recyclable
    Dishwasher safe

title: Cotton Muslin Produce Bags
description: These muslin produce bags are made from 100% cotton and are a sustainable and reusable alternative to plastic bags. The fabric is breathable and can be dampened to keep refrigerated greens crisp. They are also great for holding fine grain bulk items like flour, polenta and quinoa.

title: Bento Bag
description: The possibilities are endless with this beautiful bento bag. The bag is like a cloth basket with two pointed ends that tie together. Fill with your daily lunch, farmer's market fruits and vegetables or use as an overnight bag.

title: BLACK WATER BOTTLE
description: This water bottle will make you want to hydrate! It's lightweight and easy to bring anywhere.

title: Cotton Bread Bag
description: The Cotton Bread Bag is the perfect carrier for fresh breads, bagels and other baked goods. Each bag features a cotton tie for cinching the bread inside. The cotton fabric is breathable for storing your bread up to three days.

title: Cotton Baguette Bag
description: The Cotton Baguette Bag is essential for bakery lovers. Each bag comfortably fits two baguettes and features a cotton tie for cinching the bread inside. The shoulder strap makes it easy to carry your baguettes by foot or on bicycle.

title: Woven Market Backpack
description: The market backpack is made from handwoven palm leaves with rich brown leather straps and handles. The market backpack is perfect for biking to the farmers' market and keeping your hands free to gather produce.

title: Wild Minimalist Cotton Tote
description: Our Wild Minimalist Cotton Tote is the perfect size for carrying farmer's market produce or daily essentials when you're on the go. Each bag features a 3" wide gusset so you can comfortably carry books, bottles & other heavy items.

title: CANNING JAR DRINKING LID - REGULAR MOUTH JARS
description: One Cuppow lid for wide mouth canning jar can help live a low impact life! This lid will let you turn any wide mouth mason jar into a glass travel mug. It's perfect for everything from coffee to cocktails
material: food grade recycled plastic (polypropylene #5), BPA Free, BPS Free (a popular BPA replacement with the similar concerns), Phthalate Free

title: CANNING JAR DRINKING LID - WIDE MOUTH CLEAR

title: Glass Spray Bottles
description: Glass spray bottles are great for homemade cleaning, beauty and hair products as well as aromatherapy. This clear glass bottle is durable and can be refilled again and again. The adjustable sprayer nozzle can be used to spray or mist.

title: COTTON PRODUCE BAG LARGE
description: Hold everything! Perfect for produce, bulk dry ingredients and other groceries these easy to use, lightweight bags eliminate the need for disposable plastic bags all together.

title: COTTON PRODUCE BAG MEDIUM
description: Drawstring Produce Bag size 8.5"W x 11"H* with tare weight 1.1oz.

title: FRESHNESS EXTENDING PRODUCE BAG XL
description: Conventional plastic bags and boxes suffocate vegetables by trapping stale air and ethylene gas.  Our damp cotton Vejibag keeps moisture-loving vegetables and fruits alive and crisp in a high humidity, breathable environment.

title: Stainless Steel Tumbler with Straw
description: This stainless steel tumbler with a straw is insulated for hot or cold beverages on the go. It features a tight seal so that it won't leak or spill. A favorite for smoothie lovers!

title: Reusable Glass Coffee Cup
description: The reusable glass KeepCup is a stylish and sustainable way to grab coffee or tea on-the-go. Each cup features a natural cork band made from the upcycled waste of a wine cork manufacturer. The cup is made from a durable, tempered soda-lime glass and the black lid is BPA-free.

title: GLASS AND CORK REUSABLE BEVERAGE CUP
description: Avoid the awkward pause when ordering your coffee in a reusable cup from a barista, these barista approved coffee cups are standard coffee shop sized so your pre-coffee brain doesn't need to think twice. Also, did we mention coffee? (and yes, these can be used for tea too
material: This 12oz cup is made of fully tempered soda lime glass, the KeepCup Brew Cork Edition features a natural cork band. Made in Portugal using waste product from the wine cork manufacture, the band is beautiful to hold. Over time it’s patina will tell the story of your use. Lid is made of BPA and BPS free Polyproplyene #7 and LDPE #4.

18/8 Stainless Steel construction
Electropolished interior, a safe & non-toxic process, and rounded corners make it easy to clean

Compatible with all Klean Kanteen caps

title: SPRAY BOTTLE
description: Glass bottle with non-toxic cleaning solution suggestions for glass, granite, veggie wash, and more listed on the sides
material: Glass bottle with plastic spray top

title: STRING BAG
description: Use it for groceries, as a purse, as a weekender, for the beach, or to carry all of your mason jars

title: WOOL INSULATED NATURAL LUNCH BAG
description:
Yes, a plastic-free lunch bag! This latest version is made of 100% unbleached certified organic cotton canvas and insulated with wool. Even its metal zipper is non-plastic. The color dyes are all natural and non-toxic vegetable dyes.
The bag features an inside certified organic cotton lining that can be snapped out to wash. It is perfect for keeping your meals fresh and cool on the go. It is large enough to accommodate several of our stainless steel containers and features a external zippered pocket for inserting a spork, serviette or other accessories. The olive green hand-dyed cotton strap allows for across-the-shoulder or hand-bag type transport. Two snap buttons at the front of the bag allow a different type of closure for a bag that is even more compact.
As well, dyed parts are hand dyed with natural vegetable dyes so please do not expect perfect uniformity in the coloring - there may be lighter and darker shades of olive green on the dyed parts.
material: unbleached certified organic cotton. The insulation is 100% wool and the dyes are made of natural and non-toxic vegetable dyes

title: COLLAPSIBLE WATER BOTTLE
description: Que Bottle is a collapsible water bottle that can fit in any bag, making it convenient for travel. Comprised of Silicone, its patented spiral design collapses into half its size without compromising style. This 12oz bottle is BPA-free and plastic-free!

title: Adjustable Juco Sandwich Bag
description: Discover the wonderful properties of juco. This exclusive sandwich bag is made of juco, a new eco fabric composed of 75% jute and 25% cotton. It offers the best properties of jute, such as durability and water resistance, while having a finer weave and softer texture thanks to the presence of cotton. It is strong and reusable and its high jute content - the production of which has a low carbon and water footprint - makes its overall ecological impact very low. Jute is one of the most important natural fibres in the world and is a completely sustainable resource. Jute crops are mainly rain-fed with little need for fertilizers or pesticides. This juco sandwich bag is completely plastic-free. No velcro, no nylon lining, just juco fabric, a cotton string loop and two wooden buttons to adjust the size of the bag to either a large sandwich or a small snack of nuts or fruits.

title: TUMBLER WITH STRAW
description: This 16oz Insulated Tumbler easily transitions from morning coffee to afternoon smoothie, keeping drinks hot for 6 hours and iced for 24 hours! The stainless steel and silicone straw is removable.
material: 18/8 stainless steel body, BPA-free polypropylene #5 with silicone gasket lid, 18/8 stainless steel straw with silicone tip.

title: BioBag Compostable Shopping Bags - Large
description: BioBag Shopping Bags are made from Mater-Bi®, and can be composted together with food waste. BioBag shopping bags are intended for restaurants, farmers markets and grocery stores. They are also a practical and great addition to your promotional activities if you wish to customize.
material: GMO free starch, biodegradable polymer and other renewable resources

title: DOUBLE DUTCH Recycled Billboard Dual Pannier
description:
The Double Dutch Dual Pannier is built on the proven pannier design found in Holland and regarded as the most popular and successful bike rack bag design available. Of course we have given it an upcycled twist by making it out of cool repurposed materials. 

With easy over the rack mounting with simple cinch straps and Hook & Loop, it easily mounts to any bicycle with a rear bike rack. It can also be carried as a briefcase when off the bike. 

With two large storage compartments it is great to be able to organize items needed for your commute, after shopping or just out for a ride. 

Made in Colorado USA from upcycled repurposed heavy duty vinyl banners and other durable materials. It is water resistant and made to last.
material:
Upcycled Billboard and Banners
Upcycled Nylon Fabric
Nylon and Metal Hardware
Hook & Loop

title: CARBON COOLER Recycled Billboard Insulated Pannier
description: The Carbon Cooler is far more than a typical pannier. It is insulated to keep your food and beverages hot or cold. With a built-in cutting board and elastic pocket, this pannier can hold a 12-pack, your favorite food, utensils, and a blanket for the ride to the park. Featuring an adjustable strap that doubles as a handle, this pannier acts as a picnic basket, grocery bag, and storage compartment in one brightly-wrapped package. Wherever your adventure takes you, the Carbon Cooler is sure to make your cycling trek even more enjoyable.
material:
Upcycled Billboard and Banners
Upcycled Truck Tarp Vinyl
Nylon and Metal Hardware
Nylon fabric
10oz Vinyl Waterproof Tarp - Food Grade
Nylon Teeth and Zinc Zipper

title: ANDROMEDA Recycled Billboard Tote Bag
description: The Andromeda is an all-purpose tote fashioned for women from upcycled banners. It has a large inside compartment with an organizer pocket for smaller items. The sturdy straps rest comfortably on your shoulder or by hand. It can also be mounted with ease on your rear bike rack as a pannier for your quick trips around town. The bottom of the bag even has a reflective accent to keep you safe at night while walking or riding. Simple and functional for your everyday needs.

Upcycled Banner
Nylon Fabric
HDPE Plastic Frame Sheet
Hook and Loop

title: Reusable Patterned Bag
description:
Who said you cannot have fun and be environmentally friendly at the same time? Not us!! 

Offered in six unique styles - dots, squares, cherries, circles, hearts & globes, and hearts & bones - these reusable, stylish patterned bags make it fresh and fun to be eco-friendly! They even fold down into a nice 71/2 by 41/2 pouch, perfect to throw into a suitcase or a purse to carry home purchases at anytime. To give you an idea of just how fuctional these bags are, each bag easily fits 2 gallons of milk plus additional groceries.

title: Natural Cotton Tote - Cute Bug Designs
description:
These fun bug bags are made from heavyweight 100% recycled cotton canvas making them durable and strong totes for anything from beach or picnic items to gym clothes or even groceries! 

Each bag is printed on one side with the phrase "b.y.o.b bring your own bug" and one of the 7 different whimsical bug designs.

title: COMMUTER Recycled Bike Tube Backpack
description: Perfect for all your eco-adventures, this recycled bicycle inner tube backpack is amazingly durable and super eco-hip. The Commuter is our light and fast streamlined backpack for your day-to-day travels. It is perfect for a quick hike, a ride to class, or commute to the office. This pack will keep your goods protected with stormproof, upcycled bicycle inner tubes on the flap and durable nylon. Expandable to fit more gear.

title: Hemp Denim Zipper Bag
description: Organize your small stuff with these grab and go plastic-free natural pouches. They are fully lined, washable and available in two sizes. Made from 60% Hemp 40% Certified Organic Cotton.

title: Jute Tote (compostable)
description: Stardust Bags give you the opportunity to go plastic-free. Each bag is a refined blend of Jute with a little bit of cotton for added durability. It is 100% free of additives, toxic plastics, liners and chemicals. Good for the environment and good for you! Strong, durable, collapsible & compostable! They will last for years but once you compost them they will return to soil in 3-6 months depending on your climate. Help reduce toxic waste and support a healthier environment for future generations. Raise your standard to the Stardust Standard.
material: Jute with a little bit of cotton

title: Muslin Drawstring Bag
description: A cool alternative to a small paper bag. Can be used for bulk food, produce, or even making nut milk! Muslin!

title: Reusable Bulk Bags - WowE
description: These bags are perfect for all your bulk shopping needs and are great to consolidate fruits and veggies while at the store. Organic cotton will always be better for you and the planet than plastic bags. Make the switch with these bags from WowE!

title: JOYRIDE Upcycled Roll Top Backpack
description:
The Joyride is designed for the person who wants the most eco-friendly, colorful and durable roll-top backpack. It is built for hauling storm proof loads either in the woods or the hoods. For quick access, the top opens and closes with a flap and with its roll closure system, you can button down the hatches and roll up tight. Perfect for those that want a simple and extremely durable mid-sized storm-proof pack. 

Made from the ultimate hybridization of upcycled, recycled and conventional materials. We started with colorful upcycled industrial fabrics, then added upcycled reflective street signs, upcycled new shoulder harnesses and some new fabrics for finish. The Joyride's combination of upcycled durable materials and performance build, give this pack the technical aspects that will keep your gear close and dry. *Note: Photos of the bags may not reflect the actual color that you'll receive in the mail. Each one is made with upcycled materials, so colors and prints will vary.
material:
Upcycled Multi-Colored Industrial Fabrics
Upcycled Street Sign Scraps
10 oz Vinyl Waterproof Tarp
Aerospace Mesh
Foam Padding
Nylon Teeth with Zinc Zipper
Hook and Loop

title: Reusable Tea Bag
description: Reusable tea bags! Made with organic cotton and lots of love.

This highly sustainable brand is 100% tree-free, made from sugar cane, bamboo, and reed pulp. It’s easily compostable and certified to break down into soil, even in home composting systems. These durable tableware pieces are perfect single-use items.
The WASARA Small Tumbler is part of the complete WASARA line, which elevates disposable tableware to a whole new level. Offering the best in Japanese design, WASARA products fit comfortably in the hand, with an elegant texture and sturdy quality that are unparalleled in the category.

title: Soap Bag
description: Soap bags help with making your soap bar last longer and works as an exfoliate/scrubby for washing. This can also be used as your "soap catcher" for the little slivers of bar soap as they get down to the end of bar. Squeeze it out in between uses and allow to dry for best results!

title: Klean Kanteen Insulated Tumblers
description:
Our high performance double-wall vacuum insulation will keep drinks hot for 2 hours and iced for 10 hours. 

We electropolish the interior, a safe and non-toxic process, to make it easy to clean. Our included Tumbler Lid keeps splashing to a minimum and fits all our Insulated Tumblers and Steel Pints.

title: Tote Bag
description: Want a bag that inspires others around you? This tote bag is made from recycled cotton canvas and very clearly states that you are making an impact! Options range from a straight-forward "ZERO WASTE BAG" as a reminder for yourself as well as a spark of thought for others who see it and read it, and a ZERO market logo bag. Inspire change!

title: Klean Kanteen Insulated Growler
description: Our 32oz Stainless Steel Vacuum Insulated Growler bottle was designed with high-performance and will keep beverages at their tap-fresh temperature for hours on end. The Insulated Growler 32oz will keep drinks cold for 30 hours and iced for 80 hours. Long enough to fill up at the tap and drink the next day, still cold, fresh and delicious.

title: Produce Bags
description: Reusable drawstring Produce Bags are an easy alternative for single use plastic fruit and vegetable bags when shopping. Each set of 8 is perfectly tucked inside a brightly colored pouch with a clip to keep close by and handy. Made from BPA free recycled plastic bottles, washable - warm hand wash, holds up to 4 pounds of produce per bag! Color selection is random.

title: Kanteen Reflect w/ Bamboo Cap
description: Beautiful in its simplicity and deliberate in its design, the Reflect is handcrafted from stainless steel, food-grade silicone and sustainably harvested bamboo. Just three materials, unified for form and function. The first of its kind.
material: stainless steel, food-grade silicone and sustainably harvested bamboo

title: Tree Tribe Bottle
description: Tree Tribe Water Bottles are double layered for insulation - keeping cold water cold and hot liquids hot - with no condensation or outside temperature change. They are great to use for water, coffee, tea, juice, wine... on hikes, gym, or as your daily drinking cup. These eco friendly bottles are made with food grade stainless steel - no plastic anywhere. AND.......10 trees are planted for every bottle sold. Tree Tribe partners with organizations that plant trees to naturally replenish the environment. Their main contribution goes to planting forest gardens - diverse plots of trees and supporting species that help communities self-sustain by producing food, resources, and income, while strengthening the local ecosystem.Guaranteed to last a lifetime!

title: DOG WASTE BAGS
description: Bio Bags dog waste bags are a great way to deal with the problem of pet waste at home or in parks, communities, or other public spaces. Using BioBags takes the mess out of the messiest jobs. BioBags can also help reduce odor and bacterial build-up during collection.BioBags can be readily composted along with organic waste in municipal composting facilities. BioBag products meet the ASTM D6400 standard specification for the labeling of plastics designed to be aerobically composted in municipal or industrial facilities. Please check to make sure facilities are available in your community.
material: plants, vegetable oils, and compostable polymers

title: SANDWICH BAGS
description:
First of its kind Certified Compostable Resealable Sandwich Bags.  Add BioBag's Compostable Resealable Sandwich Bags to your green kitchen.  Much better than plastic. 
Our BioBags are made without plasticizers or other additives that may be transferred to the food.  This compostable resealable sandwich bags is good for all kinds of foods, including those with high fat and acid content.  Extremely good puncture resistance and elasticity and is FDA Approved !
material: plants, vegetable oils, and compostable polymers

title: PRODUCE BAGS
description: Bio Bags are made from cornstarch, these bags help to eliminate regular plastic bags from our environment. When disposed, Bio Bags will compost as naturally as food scraps, leaving no harmful residue. No Polyethylene is used in the production of this product. Bio Bags bags are GMO (Genetically Modified Organism) free, certified for use in organic agriculture.
material: plants, vegetable oils, and compostable polymers

title: SPINNER HYDRATION BACKPACK
description: The Spinner is designed for the person who wants the most eco-friendly and durable clamshell zipper style hydration backpack. It is built for activity either on the trail or across town. With waterbottle pockets, compression straps and hydration you know this bag is ready to go somewhere. Perfect for those that want a mid-sized backpack engineered for an adventurous life.Made from the ultimate hybridization of upcycled, recycled and conventional materials. We started with 2 upcycled mountain bike inner tubes, then added upcycled jeep top scraps, upcycled reflective street signs, some salvaged fabrics, new shoulder harnesses, and some new fabrics when needed. The Spinner’s combination of upcycled bicycle inner tubes and performance build give this pack the technical aspects that will keep you moving.

title: RUCKUS BIKE TUBE BACKPACK
description: The Ruckus is designed for the roving adventurer who plays hard and sets their own experience, yet doesn't want it at the expense of their environment. Made from upcycled bicycle inner tubes and waterproof truck tarpaulin fabric, it’s built to withstand abuse and hold all the gear you need on your daily adventures. This extremely durable, high performance backpack will complement your expeditions in life with its lasting function and sleek style.
material: Upcycled Bicycle Inner Tubes, Upcycled Shoulder Harness, Truck Tarpaulin Liner, Nylon Fabrics, 60% Recycled PETE Aerospace Mesh, Nylon and Metal Hardware and Upcycled Street Sign Scrap

title: RECYCLED BIKE TUBE ZIP POUCH
description: Designed to be simple and stylish storage solutions, these pouches are made from upcycled bicycle inner tubes. They are a great wallet alternative, cell phone case, spare change container, tool/flat repair kit. Whatever you put inside will stay safe and dry.

title: BAMBOOWARE SANTA BARBARA ROUND TUMBLERS
description: Our reusable Bambooware product line is a revolutionary dishware thats eco-friendly, biodegradable, beautiful, and durable. The process begins by taking the fiber of bamboo plants five years or older and grinding it into a fine powder. Utilizing a patented process, we mold this material into durable tableware. Each piece of our Bambooware is FDA approved, food safe, and dishwasher safe.

title: BAMBOOWARE SANTA BARBARA ROUND TUMBLER + TOP
description:
Sturdy, reusable, durable, dishwasher safe, FDA approved and 100% biodegradable. Our Dinnerware is non-toxic and melamine free and made from eco-friendly bamboo powder.
Our reusable BambooWare product line is a revolutionary dishware that is eco-friendly, biodegradable, beautiful and durable.  The process begins by taking the fiber of bamboo plants five years or older and grinding it into a fine powder.  Utilizing a patented process, we mold this material into beautiful, durable, eco-friendly plates, bowls and trays that are all 100% biodegradable.
Each piece of our BambooWare line is FDA approved food safe and can withstand even the toughest industrial dishwashers.  For the first time, BambooWare combines the eco-conscious decision to purchase dinnerware made from Earth-friendly bamboo plants with the natural desire to own dinnerware that is stylish, colorful and durable.

title: GREEN GURU
description: The Andromeda is an all purpose tote fashioned from sleek banners it boasts a voluminous storage compartment with one interior and one exterior pocket. It has sturdy straps that rest comfortably on your shoulder with a zippered closure. It can be mounted on your rear rack of your bike as a pannier with ease for your quick trips around town.
material: The Andromeda is an all purpose tote fashioned from sleek banners it boasts a voluminous storage compartment with one interior and one exterior pocket. It has sturdy straps that rest comfortably on your shoulder with a zippered closure. It can be mounted on your rear rack of your bike as a pannier with ease for your quick trips around town.

title: ATHENA CLUTCH FOR STREET AND BIKE STYLE
description: The Athena Clutch is a sensible clutch bag for style and function, on and off your bike. Quickly attach to your bicycle handlebars, top tube, or rear rack and enjoy your ride. It’s sleek look goes with any outfit, dressed up or down for any occasion.
